overview:
Director of Product Management at MrChewy.com

Previously Gerard served as Product Marketing and Engineering Manager for Titus Tool Company Inc. While at Titus, Gerard led technical product development for the North American market and managed a large product portfolio. Before joining Titus, Gerard held numerous product development and managerial positions at Newell Rubbermaid. While at Rubbermaid, Gerard spent a year living in Linhai, China leading the business development efforts for Bulldog Hardware. With his leadership, Bulldog launched their first line of floor care products into all Wal-Mart China stores. Gerard is responsible for our rapidly growing catalog of 2500 products. With meticulous attention to detail and incredible organization skills, he ensures margin and profit optimization across all categories and brands.

Gerard holds a Bachelor of Science and Master of Science degrees in Mechanical Engineering from Virginia Tech.
